title: In Hand: Himokura Hakase to Majime na Migiude
original_name: インハンド 紐倉博士とまじめな右腕
sinopse:
Tetsu Himokura, an eccentric genius and authority on parasites with an artificial arm, works as an adviser for the Health Emergency Management Bureau of the Cabinet Information Board​, where he attempts to solve cases involving medicine and anything else that's tough to deal with.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
